title: “Liquid or debris” message showing more than a month.
content:
“Liquid or debris” message showing more than a month. No visible debris or liquid. Charges only while off. Also only one particular side of the type-C adapter Message repeats after force enabling USB port.
Reset done.
Used hot blower.
Updated to the latest software version.

The message quickly disappears and reappears. After that stays for a while. The cycle repeats.
